Speaker: speaker1
Response: Do you have any particular hobbies , Tom ?

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Oh , yes . I love playing badminton , table tennis and computer games . And playing the games has become my favorite .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: I hear many teenagers will spend hours and hours sitting at computers . And they don't care about their own health at all . How about you ?

Speaker: speaker2
Response: I'm no better than them . They say it's mindless to sit in front of a machine all the time , but I think it's stimulating .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: You won't play online games full of violence , will you ?

Speaker: speaker1
Response: It's no good . And I think spending several hours each day playing computer games is a waste of time . You might as well do something healthy and meaningful .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: I hope I can practice self-control again .
